name: Ancillary Service Agreement (Mining SMEs)
description: Standard agreement for Ghanaian SMEs providing ancillary services (catering, logistics, cleaning) to large mining or industrial firms.

clauses.clause_text: THIS SERVICE AGREEMENT is made on {{agreement_date}} BETWEEN {{mining_company_name}} ('the Principal') AND {{sme_provider_name}} ('the Service Provider').
The Service Provider shall provide {{service_description_catering_transport}} at the Principal's site located at {{site_location_e_g_tarkwa}}.
The Service Provider shall strictly comply with the Principal's HSE policy and the Minerals and Mining (Health, Safety and Technical) Regulations, 2012 (L.I. 2182).

The Principal shall pay the sum of {{monthly_payment}} (GHS) per month. In accordance with the Income Tax Act, 2015 (Act 896), the Principal shall withhold {{wht_percent_e_g_7_5}}% as Withholding Tax (WHT) and provide a certificate to the Service Provider.
The Service Provider warrants that it is a 'Ghanaian Company' as defined under the Minerals and Mining (Local Content and Local Participation) Regulations, 2020 (L.I. 2431).
